CS:GO would be a lot more fun without the hackers to be honest, but still a good game.

Also to all my Russian friends seeding  torrents over the years, your efforts will not be forgotten by the ordinary people around the world. Access to entertainment should not be used as a political tool.

If you want to contract leukemia and crippling autism while simultaneuosly contributing to the russian kill count at the hands of slavic hackers, this is the game for you
Seem fun at first, but then you get 5 cheaters on enemy team and they expand your back entrance by 20cm in diameter!

I've had it with you pathetic betas crouch holding passive angles and one clicking people who are actually trying to play the game and have fun. JuSt UsE uTiLiTy, I can already see your dorito stained fingers smacking away on your stinky mechanical keyboard, well guess what Einstein, you only get four pieces of utility, how on earth are you supposed to smoke off every one of the 20,000 angles you gremlins spend hours in offline servers looking for? Like seriously, you are ruining this game, screw Global Offensive, lets call it Counter Strike, AWP Defensive, at least let new players know how they're going to get fucked.
